Comment.Language: For the Fast of the Apostles (Ps 18:3-4):

Text.Language: N/e~te n~cecwtem an e~touc~m/ a~pou q~rwou senaf e~bol hijen p~ho m~p~kahi t/rf: ouoh noucaji auvoh sa aur/jc n~]oikoumen/.
Where their voice is not heard, their voice went out on the face of the entire earth; and their words reached the end of the world.
الذين لم تسمع اصواتهم خرجت اصواتهم علي وجه الأرض كلها ، وبلغت اقوالهم إلي أقطار المسكونة
